languages.text: {n}Маражай расплывается в улыбке.{/n} "Еще ни один мон-кай, оставленный наедине со мной и моим искусством боли, не спасался из омута страданий, в который я его погружал. Души твоих соплеменников хрупки. Их убеждения и принципы — самообман, дающих их жизни подобие смысла. У нас было много времени, пока я дожидался твоего прибытия. Когда Ахиллеас вышел тебе навстречу — он уже был предан мне. Я купил его обещанием никогда больше не прикасаться ни к его телу, ни к разуму".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай расплывается в улыбке.{/n} "Еще ни один мон-кай, оставленный наедине со мной и моим искусством боли, не спасался из омута страданий, в который я его погружал. Души твоих соплеменников хрупки. Их убеждения и принципы — самообман, дающих их жизни подобие смысла. У нас было много времени, пока я дожидался твоего прибытия. Когда Ахиллеас вышел тебе навстречу — он уже был предан мне. Я купил его обещанием никогда больше не прикасаться ни к его телу, ни к его разуму".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "When a mon-keigh is left alone with me and my art of pain, I plunge them into a deep well of suffering from which they will do anything to escape. Your kind have fragile souls. Your convictions and principles are a delusion that lends a mirage of meaning to your lives. Achilleas and I had plenty of time alone together before your arrival. When he went out to meet you, he was already mine. I bought his loyalty with a promise — to never touch his body or his mind ever again."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай расплывается в улыбке.{/n} "Еще ни один мон-кай, оставленный наедине со мной и моим искусством боли, не спасался из омута страданий, в который я его погружал. Души твоих соплеменников хрупки. Их убеждения и принципы — самообман, дающих их жизни подобие смысла. У нас было много времени, пока я дожидался твоего прибытия. languages.text: {n}Marazhai sonríe abiertamente.{/n} «Cuando practico el arte del dolor a solas con un mon-keigh, lo sumo en un pozo de sufrimiento en el que hará cualquier cosa para poder salir. Las almas de tu gente son frágiles. Vuestros principios y convicciones son un delirio que crea un espejismo de sentido en vuestras vidas. Achilleas y yo pasamos mucho tiempo solos antes de tu llegada. Cuando fue a tu encuentro, ya era mío. Había comprado su lealtad con una promesa: la de nunca volver a tocar su cuerpo o su mente».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "When a mon-keigh is left alone with me and my art of pain, I plunge them into a deep well of suffering from which they will do anything to escape. Your kind have fragile souls. Your convictions and principles are a delusion that lends a mirage of meaning to your lives. Achilleas and I had plenty of time alone together before your arrival. When he went out to meet you, he was already mine. I bought his loyalty with a promise — to never touch his body or his mind ever again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sonríe abiertamente.{/n} «Cuando practico el arte del dolor a solas con un mon-keigh, lo sumo en un pozo de sufrimiento en el que hará cualquier cosa para poder salir. Las almas de tu gente son frágiles. Vuestros principios y convicciones son un delirio que crea un espejismo de sentido en vuestras vidas. Achilleas y yo pasamos mucho tiempo solos antes de tu llegada. Cuando fue a tu encuentro, ya era mío. Había comprado su lealtad con una promesa: la de nunca volver a tocar su cuerpo o su mente».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的脸上露出了笑容。{/n}“当猴子落在我的手里，我会用我痛苦的艺术，把他们拖入折磨的深渊之中，他们会不惜一切代价渴望逃离。你的族人灵魂非常脆弱，你们的信念与原则不过是妄想罢了，就像海市蜃楼一样。在你赶来之前，我和阿吉里亚斯独处了很长时间。而等他出去见你的时候，他已经是我的人了。我靠着我的承诺收买了他的忠诚，那就是，我再也不会触碰他的身体和灵魂。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "When a mon-keigh is left alone with me and my art of pain, I plunge them into a deep well of suffering from which they will do anything to escape. Your kind have fragile souls. Your convictions and principles are a delusion that lends a mirage of meaning to your lives. Achilleas and I had plenty of time alone together before your arrival. When he went out to meet you, he was already mine. I bought his loyalty with a promise — to never touch his body or his mind ever again."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的脸上露出了笑容。{/n}“当猴子落在我的手里，我会用我痛苦的艺术，把他们拖入折磨的深渊之中，他们会不惜一切代价渴望逃离。你的族人灵魂非常脆弱，你们的信念与原则不过是妄想罢了，就像海市蜃楼一样。在你赶来之前，我和阿吉里亚斯独处了很长时间。而等他出去见你的时候，他已经是我的人了。我靠着我的承诺收买了他的忠诚，那就是，我再也不会触碰他的身体和灵魂。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの顔に笑顔が広がる。{/n}「モン＝ケイが俺と俺の与える苦痛のアートと取り残されたのなら、そいつは苦しみの深い井戸に投げ込まれることになる。やつらはそこからなんとしてでも逃げようとするだろう。お前の種族の魂は脆い。お前らの信念や主義は、人生に意味をもたらすなんて幻想を与える妄想でしかない。お前が来るまでの間、俺とアキレアスは多くの時間を共に過ごした。あいつがお前に会いに行った時にはすでに、あいつは俺の側についていた。俺はあいつの体にも心にも二度と触れないという約束で忠誠心を買ったんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "When a mon-keigh is left alone with me and my art of pain, I plunge them into a deep well of suffering from which they will do anything to escape. Your kind have fragile souls. Your convictions and principles are a delusion that lends a mirage of meaning to your lives. Achilleas and I had plenty of time alone together before your arrival. When he went out to meet you, he was already mine. I bought his loyalty with a promise — to never touch his body or his mind ever again."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの顔に笑顔が広がる。{/n}「モン＝ケイが俺と俺の与える苦痛のアートと取り残されたのなら、そいつは苦しみの深い井戸に投げ込まれることになる。やつらはそこからなんとしてでも逃げようとするだろう。お前の種族の魂は脆い。お前らの信念や主義は、人生に意味をもたらすなんて幻想を与える妄想でしかない。お前が来るまでの間、俺とアキレアスは多くの時間を共に過ごした。あいつがお前に会いに行った時にはすでに、あいつは俺の側についていた。俺はあいつの体にも心にも二度と触れないという約束で忠誠心を買ったんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un sourire illumine le visage de Marazhai.{/n} « Quand un mon-keigh se retrouve confié à mes bons soins, je le plonge dans un abîme de souffrance d'où il fera tout pour s'échapper. Vous et les vôtres avez l'âme fragile. Vos convictions et principes ne sont guère que des illusions qui confèrent un semblant de sens à votre existence. Achilleas et moi avons passé beaucoup de temps ensemble, avant votre arrivée. Quand il est venu à votre rencontre, il était déjà en mon pouvoir. Il m'a suffi d'une simple promesse pour acheter sa loyauté... celle de ne plus jamais toucher ni à son corps ni à son esprit. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "When a mon-keigh is left alone with me and my art of pain, I plunge them into a deep well of suffering from which they will do anything to escape. Your kind have fragile souls. Your convictions and principles are a delusion that lends a mirage of meaning to your lives. Achilleas and I had plenty of time alone together before your arrival. When he went out to meet you, he was already mine. I bought his loyalty with a promise — to never touch his body or his mind ever again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire illumine le visage de Marazhai.{/n} « Quand un mon-keigh se retrouve confié à mes bons soins, je le plonge dans un abîme de souffrance d'où il fera tout pour s'échapper. Vous et les vôtres avez l'âme fragile. Vos convictions et principes ne sont guère que des illusions qui confèrent un semblant de sens à votre existence. Achilleas et moi avons passé beaucoup de temps ensemble, avant votre arrivée. Quand il est venu à votre rencontre, il était déjà en mon pouvoir. Il m'a suffi d'une simple promesse pour acheter sa loyauté... celle de ne plus jamais toucher ni à son corps ni à son esprit. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein Grinsen macht sich auf Marazhais Gesicht breit.{/n} "Wenn ein Chem-Pan-Sey mit mir und meiner Kunst der Schmerzen allein gelassen wird, stürze ich ihn in einen tiefen Brunnen des Leids, und er wird alles tun, um daraus zu entkommen. Ihr habt fragile Seelen. Eure Überzeugungen und Grundsätze sind nur eine Selbsttäuschung, die Euch vorgaukelt, Euer Leben hätte einen Sinn. Achilleas und ich hatten vor Eurer Ankunft reichlich Zeit zu zweit. Als er losgezogen ist, um Euch zu begrüßen, gehörte er bereits mir. Ich habe mir seine Loyalität mit einem Versprechen erkauft — nie wieder seinen Körper oder seinen Verstand zu berühren."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "When a mon-keigh is left alone with me and my art of pain, I plunge them into a deep well of suffering from which they will do anything to escape. Your kind have fragile souls. Your convictions and principles are a delusion that lends a mirage of meaning to your lives. Achilleas and I had plenty of time alone together before your arrival. When he went out to meet you, he was already mine. I bought his loyalty with a promise — to never touch his body or his mind ever again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Grinsen macht sich auf Marazhais Gesicht breit.{/n} "Wenn ein Chem-Pan-Sey mit mir und meiner Kunst der Schmerzen allein gelassen wird, stürze ich ihn in einen tiefen Brunnen des Leids, und er wird alles tun, um daraus zu entkommen. Ihr habt fragile Seelen. Eure Überzeugungen und Grundsätze sind nur eine Selbsttäuschung, die Euch vorgaukelt, Euer Leben hätte einen Sinn. Achilleas und ich hatten vor Eurer Ankunft reichlich Zeit zu zweit. Als er losgezogen ist, um Euch zu begrüßen, gehörte er bereits mir. Ich habe mir seine Loyalität mit einem Versprechen erkauft — nie wieder seinen Körper oder seinen Verstand zu berühren."

Your kind have fragile souls. Your convictions and principles are a delusion that lends a mirage of meaning to your lives. Achilleas and I had plenty of time alone together before your arrival. languages.text: {n}Marazhai birden gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bir mon-keigh'i ben ve ızdırap sanatımla baş başa bırakırsan olacağı budur. Öyle tarifsiz acılar çektiririm ki kurtulmak için her şeyi yapar. Çok narin ruhlarınız var. İnançlarınız, prensipleriniz... Hayatlarınıza anlam katsın diye kurulmuş birer illüzyondan ibaret. Sen gelmeden önce Achilleas'la bayağı bir zaman geçirdik. Yanına çıktığında o çoktan benimdi. Sadakati karşılığında bir daha aklına veya bedenine dokunmama sözü vermem yetti."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face breaks into a smile.{/n} "When a mon-keigh is left alone with me and my art of pain, I plunge them into a deep well of suffering from which they will do anything to escape. Your kind have fragile souls. Your convictions and principles are a delusion that lends a mirage of meaning to your lives. Achilleas and I had plenty of time alone together before your arrival. When he went out to meet you, he was already mine. I bought his loyalty with a promise — to never touch his body or his mind ever again."

Çok narin ruhlarınız var. İnançlarınız, prensipleriniz... Hayatlarınıza anlam katsın diye kurulmuş birer illüzyondan ibaret. Sen gelmeden önce Achilleas'la bayağı bir zaman geçirdik.
